body:
I'll get to the point, the ruqqus' content could drive away many users, just like reddit's clown show drove us away. IMO for this site to not just grow, but to become THE alternative to reddit we should have at least x10 or x20 times more active users (which is different from simply counting the number of accounts created)

For this I think it's necessary to promote more Guilds ASAP and make them grow, hopefully Guilds about hobbies, professions, games, countries, anime, etc. Why? Because we need more diverse content (in this context that word is positive) which we can share in Whatsapp groups, Telegram channels or Discord servers... and with a little effort, perseverance and luck maybe some sites with high traffic could put links to ruqqus.

I know that we can count on +Guild to make other guilds known, but not everyone who visits ruqqus knows it exists, so what do I propose? My idea is to use the space I highlighted in the screenshot so that the mods can put one random Guild per day (or maybe every 12 or 6 hours so they rotate faster)

The problem with "Trending" and "All" is that if most of the content is political, it will almost always be promoted there, which will produce more posts/comments on those topics and there will be a snowball effect, but not everyone wants to see political content all the time, so I think it might even be detrimental.

Maybe my solution is not the best, but I think it is an issue that needs to be addressed, hopefully ruqqus admins can see this post.
